overview:
Tal, co-founder of AllofMe, is a former musician and an Internet and User Interface professional, living in Israel.

Born 1967, Tal joined the Israeli Defense Forces in 1986 and left the duty service four years later as a Military Police officer.

During 1990-2000 Tal developed a professional musical career as a keyboard player and composer, member of platinum winning Israeli pop band “Avtipus” and sharing the winning of the Israeli Film Academy award for the soundtrack of feature film “Vulkan Junction” (Israel, 2000)

Starting 1996, Tal developed a second, freelance career as a programmer for multimedia presentations and for the web.

Between 2000-2004 Tal has worked full time as a senior developer and team leader in various startups.

In 2004 Tal joined the founding team of Metacafe as a user interface programmer.

In 2007, together with Addy Feuersein, tal co-founded AllofMe, being VP R&D and taking charge of the company’s IT.

In parallel to his career, Tal keeps serving in IDF’s reserves forces, currently as a Lieutenant Colonel in the Military Police.

image.attribution: Tal Yaniv / Home page
